name: Slime Tamer (Simoxeh)
description:
The king has given you a mission to retrieve a Slime so that Slimes can be better understood. Naturally slimes live in dangerous dungeons. You will be given your trusty vacuum to help you and well nothing else since the budget ran dry. Your job is to retrieve the slime without damaging the slime or yourself.

The following work was used in the creation of this game.
